00008   Sass_Value* Map::construct(const std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> raw_val, Sass_Value **out) {
00009     size_t length = 0;
00010 
00011     if (raw_val.size() >= 1) {
00012       if (!raw_val[0]->IsNumber()) {
00013         return fail("First argument should be an integer.", out);
00014       }
00015 
00016       length = Nan::To<uint32_t>(raw_val[0]).FromJust();
00017     }
00018 
00019     return *out = sass_make_map(length);
00020   }

00030   NAN_METHOD(Map::GetValue) {
00031 
00032     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00033       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00034     }
00035 
00036     if (!info[0]->IsNumber()) {
00037       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied index should be an integer").ToLocalChecked());
00038     }
00039 
00040     Sass_Value* map = unwrap(info.This())->value;
00041     size_t index = Nan::To<uint32_t>(info[0]).FromJust();
00042 
00043 
00044     if (index >= sass_map_get_length(map)) {
00045       return Nan::ThrowRangeError(Nan::New("Out of bound index").ToLocalChecked());
00046     }
00047 
00048     info.GetReturnValue().Set(Factory::create(sass_map_get_value(map, Nan::To<uint32_t>(info[0]).FromJust()))->get_js_object());
00049   }

00051   NAN_METHOD(Map::SetValue) {
00052     if (info.Length() != 2) {
00053       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected two arguments").ToLocalChecked());
00054     }
00055 
00056     if (!info[0]->IsNumber()) {
00057       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied index should be an integer").ToLocalChecked());
00058     }
00059 
00060     if (!info[1]->IsObject()) {
00061       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a SassValue object").ToLocalChecked());
00062     }
00063 
00064     Value* sass_value = Factory::unwrap(info[1]);
00065     if (sass_value) {
00066       sass_map_set_value(unwrap(info.This())->value, Nan::To<uint32_t>(info[0]).FromJust(), sass_value->get_sass_value());
00067     } else {
00068       Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New<v8::String>("A SassValue is expected as a map value").ToLocalChecked());
00069     }
00070   }
